class-1.description: Class 1 notes, worksheets, and fun activities. Build a strong learning foundation with basics of Math, English, and fundamental subjects for Grade 1 students.

class-2.description: Class 2 study materials, interactive lessons, and essential notes. Enhance reading, writing, and arithmetic skills with engaging content for Grade 2 learners.

class-3.description: Class 3 subject guides, EVS notes, and Math exercises. comprehensive resources to support academic growth and curiosity for Grade 3 students.

class-4.description: Class 4 curriculum notes, science basics, and language lessons. Structured study aids to improve understanding and grades for Grade 4 pupils.

class-5.description: Class 5 exam prep, revision notes, and scholarship study guides. Prepare for primary school finals with targeted resources for Grade 5 students.

class-6.description: Class 6 standard notes, introduced to secondary subjects. foundational science, math, and social science resources for middle school transition.

class-7.description: Class 7 comprehensive guides, math solutions, and science concepts. In-depth study materials to master middle school syllabus topics effectively.

class-8.description: Class 8 board prep foundation, science projects, and math formulas. Essential resources for academic excellence and high school readiness.

class-9.description: Class 9 SEBA/CBSE notes, important questions, and chapter summaries. Building benchmarks for board exams with rigorous study materials.

class-10.description: Class 10 Board Exam notes, sample papers, and topper strategies. Complete guide to acing HSLC/CBSE finals with expert-curated content.

class-11.description: Class 11 stream-wise notes (Science/Arts/Commerce). Foundational concepts for higher secondary education and competitive entrance exam preparation.

class-12.description: Class 12 AHSEC/CBSE study materials, practical guides, and solved papers. Final year resources for board success and college admissions.

bsc.description: B.Sc semester notes, lab manuals, and major subject guides. Physics, Chemistry, Zoology, and Botany resources for undergraduate science degrees.

bca.description: BCA programming notes, coding tutorials, and project ideas. Computer application study materials including C, Java, and Database Management Systems.

b-tech.description: B.Tech engineering notes, lecture slides, and technical assignments. Resources for CSE, Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical engineering semesters.

ba.description: B.A. subject notes, literature summaries, and social essays. History, Political Science, and English resources for arts undergraduates.

bcom.description: B.Com accounting notes, business law summaries, and finance guides. Study aids for commerce undergraduates to master trade and economics.

d.el.ed.description: D.El.Ed coursework notes, child pedagogy, and lesson plans. Essential training materials for future elementary educators and diploma students.

b.ed.description: B.Ed entrance notes, teaching methodology, and practicum files. Comprehensive resources for Bachelor of Education aspirants and trainees.

apsc.description: APSC Prelims and Mains notes, Assam GK, and current affairs. Strategic study materials for Assam Public Service Commission aspirants.

adre.description: ADRE grade 3 & 4 study notes, aptitude tricks, and mock tests. Targeted preparation for Assam Direct Recruitment Exams.

tet.description: TET child development notes, pedagogy, and language papers. Complete guide to clearing Teacher Eligibility Tests in Assam.

ctet.description: CTET paper 1 & 2 study guides, NCERT summaries, and pedagogy notes. Central Teacher Eligibility Test preparation for national level teaching jobs.

scert.description: SCERT Assam textbook solutions, syllabus guides, and teacher resources. State curriculum aligned materials for Assam board schools.

ncert.description: NCERT solutions, chapter explanations, and quick revision notes. Standardized study content useful for CBSE and national competitive exams.

computer-science.description: Computer Science concepts, coding syntax, and algorithm logic. Notes on Python, C++, Web Dev, and IT fundamentals for students.

english.description: English grammar rules, literature analysis, and writing skills. Improve communication and ace language exams with structured lessons.

maths.description: Mathematics formulas, theorem proofs, and problem-solving tricks. From algebra to calculus, master math concepts for all classes.

assamese.description: Assamese literature notes, grammar (Byakaran), and composition. Study materials for MIL and Elective Assamese subjects.

social-science.description: Social Science chapters covering History, Geography, and Civics. Integrated notes for understanding society, past events, and governance.

science.description: General Science concepts, experiments, and diagrams. Physics, Chemistry, and Biology basics explained for school level understanding.

arts.description: Arts stream subjects, humanities insights, and creative studies. Resources covering Sociology, Education, Logic, and Philosophy.

physics.description: Physics derivations, laws of motion, and numerical solutions. In-depth notes for Class 11-12 and B.Sc physics papers.

chemistry.description: Chemistry equations, periodic table, and organic reactions. Detailed study guides for physical, organic, and inorganic chemistry.

biology.description: Biology diagrams, life processes, and genetic notes. Comprehensive resources for Zoology and Botany students from school to college.

zoology.description: Zoology study notes, animal kingdom classification, and physiology. Specialized content for bio-science students and competitive exams.

botany.description: Botany notes on plant physiology, genetics, and ecology. Plant science study materials for HS and graduate students.

history.description: History dates, timeline of events, and civilization studies. Ancient, Medieval, and Modern Indian history notes for exams.

geography.description: Geography maps, physical features, and climate notes. Study earth sciences and regional geography of Assam and India.

politics.description: Political Science constitution notes, international relations, and theory. Understanding governance, rights, and political systems.

bodo.description: Bodo language literature, grammar, and text analysis. Study resources for Bodo medium students and language learners.

economics.description: Economics micro and macro concepts, Indian economy, and statistics. Understanding markets, GDP, and development for commerce/arts.

accountancy.description: Accountancy ledgers, balance sheets, and financial statements. Step-by-step guides for class 11-12 and B.Com accounting.

hindi.description: Hindi Bhasha grammar, literature summaries, and poetry analysis. Resources for Rastrabhasha and subject preparation.

seba.description: SEBA board notifications, latest syllabus, and exam patterns. Specific resources for students under Secondary Education Board of Assam.

ahsec.description: AHSEC council updates, stream-wise syllabus, and HS 1st/2nd year notes. Resources for Assam Higher Secondary students.

asseb.description: ASSEB new curriculum, board updates, and integrated resources. Information and materials for the consolidated Assam state board.

evs.description: Environmental Studies notes on ecology, pollution, and conservation. Awareness and syllabus coverage for school and college EVS.

gk.description: General Knowledge quizzes, facts, and trivia. Boost your IQ and preparation for quiz competitions and competitive exams.

grammar.description: Comprehensive grammar rules for English, Assamese, and Hindi. Master sentence structure, tenses, and vocabulary usage.

music.description: Music theory, classical ragas, and history of instruments. Educational resources for music students and theoretical exams.

dance.description: Dance forms, history of classical dance, and cultural significance. Notes on Sattriya, Kathak, and folk dances of India.

mil.description: MIL (Major Indian Languages) syllabus notes and text summaries. Study content for compulsory language papers in HS/Degree.

sanskrit.description: Sanskrit Shlokas, grammar (Vyakaran), and text translation. Heritage language learning resources for school and college.

elective.description: Elective subject notes covering customized options. Study materials for additional subjects chosen in HS and Degree courses.

adv-maths.description: Advanced Mathematics complex numbers, calculus, and trigonometry. Specialized notes for elective math students in High School.

adv-assamese.description: Advanced Assamese literature criticism and history. In-depth study for major/elective Assamese students.

statistics.description: Statistics formulas, probability theory, and data interpretation. Mathematical stats notes for economics, commerce, and math students.

biotechnology.description: Biotech principles, genetic engineering, and applications. Modern science notes for HS and degree level biotechnology.

agriculture.description: Agriculture science concepts, crop production, and soil science. Educational content for vocational and biology agriculture papers.
